title: Verify: Redesign Workflow Editor UI
description:
Run automated tests for task T-019.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Overhaul the workflow editor layout: collapsible node palette (left), ReactFlow canvas (center), node inspector (right), execution log (bottom), top bar (name/run/save).
Criteria:
- Editor layout matches spec
- All panels functional and responsive
- No major regressions
